messages.greeting: Hi! 👋 I'm your AI travel assistant. Where would you like to go?
messages.userRequest: I want to visit Barcelona for 5 days!
messages.aiResponse: Great choice! 🇪🇸 Barcelona is amazing. Let me ask a few questions to personalize your trip...

messages.userRequest: Can you add a food tour after Park Güell?
messages.aiResponse: Of course! 🍴 I'll add the "Barcelona Food Tour" at 12:30 PM, right after Park Güell...
messages.success: Done! I've adjusted the times for you.

steps.step1: Share your unique link with friends

steps.step3: You both get 1 free AI trip!

share.twitterText: I've been using MonkeyTravel to plan amazing AI-powered trips! Join me and get a FREE trip when you sign up:
share.whatsappText: Hey! I've been using MonkeyTravel to plan amazing trips with AI. Join me and we both get a FREE trip!
share.emailSubject: You're invited to MonkeyTravel - Get a FREE AI trip!
share.emailBody:
Hey!

I've been using MonkeyTravel to plan amazing trips with AI, and I thought you'd love it too.

Join using my link and we'll both get a FREE AI-generated trip!

Happy travels!
